November 10stereotype

toad:


It is with great regret today that I must announce the banning of toad, a regular idler in #houseofshadows and the inspiration for booty. Apparently the ETG network had some problems with another user on toad's mask and has banned the entire box from the services. We hope you will all keep toad in your prayers so that he may return from a new mask shortly. #plan_b will be running at half mast today in respect to toad. If any of you out there fear you might lose someone important to you in a ban, please join #ETG - don't let this happen to you :(

(join) toad (~meow@zenock.lightrealm.com) has joined #houseofshadows 12:11am East
(quit) toad (~meow@zenock.lightrealm.com) has QUIT IRC 12:11am East (Killed (Services.EnterTheGame.Com ()))

November 10jokerbone

Welcome to the family!

November 4grant

Welcome Lemon to our family!:


Lemon has been hanging and playing with us for a little while now, and he has now decided to join our ranks. He is a really nice guy, great teamplayer and generally just a fun to hang with. He used to be with Fully Loaded and infraction, and one must admit: one can tell. Brian is the walking dm6 and dm7 strat guide :)
So without further delay give Brian a warm plan:b welcoming!

November 4stereotype

pure?:


These aren't especially new releases but I hadn't played in a while yesterday and ended up having to hit both sites - i'd suggest everyone checks on the newest version. Maybe I'll start a rant concerning how the majority of the features added by things like osp and q3comp should have been in the original game. Maybe...
Anyway, hit up: Orangesmootie.org and Reactive software for the newest releases and be PURE!

November 2grant

ggs to da| :


All in all it was a very cool evening I think. We had some really fun games with dragonarmy tonight. All 4 games were lost, but we did well on dm7 and found a new and fun group of guys to play with. So in conlcusion: We've gotta do this again ;)

November 2stereotype

Welcome Tyson to the family!:


A lot of us have known Tyson for a long time now, and therefore we are most proud and excited to have him on board! He has a strong background in “quaking” and has been a long-term member of HDU (a group for which we have always had nothing but the highest respect).

*/me rejoices and wanders off singing “for he’s a jolly good fellow, for he’s a jolly good fellow…”*

November 1grant

Navbar colors?:


Well. I need a little help from the b:peeps here. In addition to making it a bit narrower, I've come to the conclusion that i like even the most putrid of colors for the navigation bar that is currently lightblue (as seen above) for this website.

I attempted to enlist the help of nate and evan but was forced to fire both of them for incompetence and the fact that they are both colorblind ass-clowns. (nate even thinks the centering is all wrong on this page)

Here are my current favorites. Someone please push me towards one of these or suggest something else?

Thanks!

** - I ended up centering the site like nate wanted to.. he's setting a good example for evan, who still hasn't gotten his shit together.

November 1grant

beta progress:


Hi gang. for those of you that actually look at this site, it's been registered as http://beta-b.n3.net/ for quite some time now and I suggest you use that as the address to bookmark.
I work on the site pretty much every day neglecting schoolwork and whatnot and I would greatly appreciate any feedback via the private messageboard. thanks go out to any that see this :)
